review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick is really nice, and it will probably work well for most people. I currently have 5 Google Chromecasts in my home and I wanted to get the Fire TV Stick to test out and compare. I use the Chromecast and this device almost solely for Plex, and for some reason the Plex performance with the Amazon Fire TV Stick is very poor. Video will freeze and buffer constantly, the Chromecast (also connected wireless) works without issue, Roku works great, smartphones are great, web browser use with Plex is excellent, but the Fire TV Stick is unusable. This could be the fault of Plex (although the app seems well polished, compared to the Roku app which is terrible)Anyway, if you want this for Amazon Prime Video, Netflix or Hulu it's a great choice.
